import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {works} from '../data' const Student = () => { const [activeModuleIndex, setActiveModuleIndex] = useState(0); const handleModuleClick = (index) => { setActiveModuleIndex(index); }; const [selectedSection, setSelectedSection] = useState('dashboard-section'); // Define a function to handle clicks on navigation links function handleNavigationClick(section) { setSelectedSection(section); } return (
